data.title: London 2012 Medalists
data.text:
London 2012 Medal Winners

Medallistas Londres 2012

The 2012 Summer Olympic programme featured 26 sports and a total of 962 medals (302 gold, 304 silver, 356 bronze). In this list we show the names of all those medal winners. The sports are numbered to make a total of 29, as aquatic disciplines (diving, swimming, synchro swimming and water polo) are listed on their own. However, they account for just one sport, as they are regulated by the same federation. Along the name of the sport is the number of events, i.e. the number of gold medals awarded.

En los Juegos OlÃ­mpicos de Londres se han disputado competiciones en 26 deportes, otorgÃ¡ndose un total de 962 medallas (302 oro, 304 plata, 356 bronce). En este listado estÃ¡n los nombres de todos los que las han ganado. Los deportes estÃ¡n numerados y hacen un total de 29 porque las disciplinas acuÃ¡ticas (nataciÃ³n, saltos, nataciÃ³n sincronizada y waterpolo) estÃ¡n listadas por separado, aunque en realidad todas estÃ¡n reguladas por la misma federaciÃ³n. Junto a cada deporte estÃ¡ entre parÃ©ntesis el nÃºmero de pruebas disputadas.
